name: Guns n Staches
description:
New York City at night. Crime syndicates rule the streets. The police can’t handle the situation on their own. Only one cop can help the suppressed. He wears his sunglasses at night. He has a fabulous moustache. Detective Frank Steel is here to take care of the situation… and he doesn’t negotiate!

Key Features:

- 2,5D Sicescroller Shooter

- Loads of gangster thugs

- Flashy 80’s art style and sound

- 80’s Action Hero Humor

- Boss Fight
